languages.text: Пустынная заснеженная планета, казалось, не обещала никаких сюрпризов. Однако желто-оранжевое перемигивание люменов и оповещение системы авгуров сообщили офицерам о том, что на мире обнаружена небольшая колония, сумевшая выжить в суровых климатических условиях. Связаться с ней не удается.

traits.locale_text: Офицеры уныло глядят сквозь окна мостика на очередную заснеженную планету. Однако желто-оранжевое перемигивание люменов и оповещение системы авгуров заставляют их прийти в себя — на мире обнаружена небольшая колония, сумевшая выжить в суровых климатических условиях. Связаться с ней не удается.

languages.text: At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived in spite of the harsh climatic conditions. All attempts to hail the colony have failed.
languages.original_text: Пустынная заснеженная планета, казалось, не обещала никаких сюрпризов. Однако желто-оранжевое перемигивание люменов и оповещение системы авгуров сообщили офицерам о том, что на мире обнаружена небольшая колония, сумевшая выжить в суровых климатических условиях. Связаться с ней не удается.

traits.locale_text: At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived despite the harsh climatic conditions. All the attempts to hail it failed.

At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived despite the harsh climatic conditions. All the attempts to hail it failed.

At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived in spite of the harsh climatic conditions. All attempts to hail the colony have failed.

At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived in spite of the harsh climatic conditions. All attempts to hail the colony have failed.

At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived in spite of the harsh climatic conditions. All attempts to hail the colony have failed.

languages.text: 乍看之下，这颗白雪皑皑的荒凉行星似乎平淡无奇，并没有什么特别的惊喜。不过，远处闪烁的橙黄色灯光与扫描系统的通知意味着，即便是在这样恶劣的气候之中，仍然有一座小小的殖民地在努力求生。军官尝试与殖民地取得联系，但全都失败了。
languages.original_text: At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived in spite of the harsh climatic conditions. All attempts to hail the colony have failed.

traits.locale_text: 乍看之下，这颗白雪皑皑的荒凉行星似乎平淡无奇，并没有什么特别的惊喜。不过，远处闪烁的橙黄色灯光与扫描系统的通知意味着，即便是在这样恶劣的气候之中，仍然有一座小小的殖民地在努力求生。军官尝试与殖民地取得联系，但全都失败了。

languages.text: 当初、雪に覆われた荒涼とした惑星には驚くようなものは何もないように思えたが、ルーメンの黄色とオレンジの明滅とスキャンシステムからの通知が、厳しい気候条件にもかかわらず生き残った小さなコロニーがあることを士官たちに教えてくれた。コロニーを呼び寄せる試みはすべて失敗していたのだ。
languages.original_text: At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived in spite of the harsh climatic conditions. All attempts to hail the colony have failed.

traits.locale_text: 当初、雪に覆われた荒涼とした惑星には驚くようなものは何もないように思えたが、ルーメンの黄色とオレンジの明滅とスキャンシステムからの通知が、厳しい気候条件にもかかわらず生き残った小さなコロニーがあることを士官たちに教えてくれた。コロニーを呼び寄せる試みはすべて失敗していたのだ。

languages.text: Al principio parecía que el planeta nevado y desolado carecía de sorpresas, pero el destello amarillo y naranja de las luces y las notificaciones del sistema de augures informaron a los oficiales de que había una pequeña colonia que sobrevivía a pesar de las duras condiciones climáticas. Todos los intentos de localizar la colonia fracasaron.
languages.original_text: At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived in spite of the harsh climatic conditions. All attempts to hail the colony have failed.

traits.locale_text: Al principio parecía que el planeta nevado y desolado carecía de sorpresas, pero el destello amarillo y naranja de las luces y las notificaciones del sistema de augures informaron a los oficiales de que había una pequeña colonia que sobrevivía a pesar de las duras condiciones climáticas. Todos los intentos de localizar la colonia fracasaron.

languages.text: Zuerst sah es aus, als sei der verschneite, einsame Planet frei von jeder Überraschung. Doch das orange-gelbe Flackern der Lumens und die Benachrichtigung des Auguren-Systems ließen die Offiziere wissen, dass es eine kleine Kolonie gab, die hier trotz des rauen Klimas überlebte. Alle Versuche, Kontakt mit der Kolonie aufzunehmen, sind gescheitert.
languages.original_text: At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived in spite of the harsh climatic conditions. All attempts to hail the colony have failed.

traits.locale_text: Zuerst sah es aus, als sei der verschneite, einsame Planet frei von jeder Überraschung. Doch das orange-gelbe Flackern der Lumens und die Benachrichtigung des Auguren-Systems ließen die Offiziere wissen, dass es eine kleine Kolonie gab, die hier trotz des rauen Klimas überlebte. Alle Versuche, Kontakt mit der Kolonie aufzunehmen, sind gescheitert.

languages.text: À première vue, il semble que cette planète de glace désolée ne vous réserve pas la moindre surprise, mais le clignotement orange et jaune des lumens et les notifications du système des augures informent les officiers qu'une petite colonie a survécu malgré les conditions climatiques extrêmes. Cependant, toutes les tentatives pour établir la communication avec les habitants se soldent par un échec.
languages.original_text: At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived in spite of the harsh climatic conditions. All attempts to hail the colony have failed.

traits.locale_text: À première vue, il semble que cette planète de glace désolée ne vous réserve pas la moindre surprise, mais le clignotement orange et jaune des lumens et les notifications du système des augures informent les officiers qu'une petite colonie a survécu malgré les conditions climatiques extrêmes. Cependant, toutes les tentatives pour établir la communication avec les habitants se soldent par un échec.

languages.text: Karlarla kaplı bu ıssız gezegen ilk bakışta hiçbir sürpriz barındırmıyormuş gibi dursa da sarı ve turuncu renklerde parıldayan lümenlerle alamet sisteminden gelen bildirimler sayesinde subaylar sert iklim koşullarına rağmen sağ kalmayı başaran ufak bir koloni olduğunu öğrendi. Koloniyle iletişime geçmek için gerçekleşen tüm denemeler ise başarısız oldu.
languages.original_text: At first it looked like the snowy and desolate planet was devoid of surprises, but the yellow and orange flickering of the lumens and the notifications from the augur system informed the officers there was a small colony that survived in spite of the harsh climatic conditions. All attempts to hail the colony have failed.
